packagegui.title: Proxy server: Reverse Proxy

field.description: The interface(s) the reverse-proxy server will bind to.
The external full-qualified-domain-name of the WAN address.
If this field is checked, the proxy-server will act in HTTP reverse mode.
This is the port the HTTP reverse-proxy will listen on. (leave empty to use 80)
This is the HTTP reverse default site. (leave empty to use the external fqdn)
If this field is checked, the proxy-server will act in HTTPS reverse mode.
This is the port the HTTPS reverse-proxy will listen on. (leave empty to use 443)
This is the HTTPS reverse default site. (leave empty to use the external fqdn)
Choose the SSL Server Certificate here.
If this field is checked, internal certificate validation will be ignored.
This field defines additional extension methods for the proxy to use. (RPC_IN_DATA RPC_OUT_DATA for RPC over HTTP -> Outlook Anywhere)

field.fielddescr: Reset TCP connections if request is unauthorized.
field.description: If this field is checked, the reverse-proxy will reset the TCP connection if the request is unauthorized.
This is the internal published server peer IP.
This is the internal published server peer port.
This is the URL to publish.
